location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Kaye, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of instructions, dated 20 June 1811, to the Resident instructing him to regularly send his 'account current of receipts or advances and supplies on the account of the three Presidencies (Bengal, Bombay and Madras) supported by vouchers'.
